instructions: To start, take note of the hashtag for the challenge video you wish to record. You'll need this later on. Tap the Plus icon to either record a new video inside the TikTok app or upload your own video from your phone. Once you're done, tap the checkmark . Review your video and make any changes. Once complete, tap Next . On the Post screen, you'll need to enter a description that includes with the challenge hashtag you wish to use. Once your description is finished and you've selected your sharing settings, tap Post to post your challenge video to your personal feed.
